NK002(kha)018:0: sangs rgyas sman bla mched bdun gyi rjes gnang bya
NK002(kha)018:1: tshul bklag chog don grub bsam 'phel zhes bya ba
NK002(kha)018:2: bzhugs so // bla ma dang sangs rgyas sman bla la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK002(kha)018:3: 'di'i rjes gnang la sbyor dngos rjes gsum las /
NK002(kha)018:5: gnas yid du 'ong bar gzhi bzang po'i steng du
NK002(kha)018:6: many+dzi'i khar man+dala la tshom bu bdun bkod pa'i mthar
NK002(kha)018:7: mtshams 'dzin gyi me tog chu gnyis nyer spyod lnga
NK002(kha)018:9: mdun du gtor ma zlum po gsum /
NK002(kha)018:10: slob dpon gyi mdun du ting shag /
NK002(kha)018:12: slob ma la bkye bsdu'i me tog man+dala la sogs phyag len ltar bsham mo //
NK002(kha)018:16: swa b+h+aa wa shud+d+hahsarba d+har+m+aahs+w+aa b+h+aa wa shud+d+ho&a ham /
NK002(kha)018:17: stong pa'i ngang las las byung ba'i rin po che
NK002(kha)018:18: las grub pa'i snod yangs shing rgya che ba'i nang
NK002(kha)018:19: du 'od du zhu ba las byung ba'i lha rdzas
NK002(kha)018:27: rol mo rnams dwangs shing thogs pa med pa nam mkha'i mtha' klas par gyur /
NK002(kha)018:36: sarba bud+d+ha k+she tra pra t+r+aa li ni /
NK002(kha)018:37: pradz+ny+aa pa ra mi ta n+aa da sam b+ha we /
NK002(kha)018:38: badz+ra d+harma hri da ya sa n+to sha ni h'u h'u h'u hohhohhoh+aahkham s+w+aa h+aa /
NK002(kha)018:39: lan gsum rol mo dang bcas pa brjod /
NK002(kha)018:40: bdag dang 'gro ba nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'i
NK002(kha)018:41: sems can thams cad dus 'di nas bzung ste ji
NK002(kha)018:42: srid byang chub snying po la mchis kyi bar du
NK002(kha)018:43: dpal ldan bla ma dam pa rnams la skyabs su
NK002(kha)018:44: mchi'o // rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la skyabs su mchi'o //
NK002(kha)018:45: dam pa'i chos rnams la skyabs su mchi'o //
NK002(kha)018:46: 'phags pa'i dge 'dun rnams la skyabs su mchi'o //
NK002(kha)018:48: sems can thams cad kyi don du sangs rgyas kyi go 'phang thob par bya /
NK002(kha)018:49: de'i ched du sangs rgyas sman bla'i sgom bzlas nyams su blang bar bagyi'o //
NK002(kha)018:51: rang skad cig gis sangs rgyas sman blar gsal ba'i
NK002(kha)018:52: thugs ka'i h'u las 'od zer 'phros pas rang bzhin
NK002(kha)018:53: gyi gnas nas sangs rgyas sman gyi bla ma la
NK002(kha)018:54: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs bsam gyis
NK002(kha)018:55: mi khyab pas bskor ba mdun gyi nam mkhar badz+ra
NK002(kha)018:56: sa m+aa dzah thugs rje kun la snyoms pa'i bcom
NK002(kha)018:57: ldan 'das // mtshan tsam thos pas ngan 'gro'i sdug bsngal sel //
NK002(kha)018:58: dug gsum nad sel sangs rgyas sman gyi bla //
NK002(kha)018:59: bee d+aur+ya yi 'od la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK002(kha)018:60: b+hee sha dz+ye gu ru bee d+aur+ya pra b+ha r+aa
NK002(kha)018:61: dza ya sa pa ri w+aa ra badz+ra ar+g+ham sogs
NK002(kha)018:63: dkon mchog gsum la bdag skyabs mchi //
NK002(kha)018:65: 'gro la phan phyir sangs rgyas 'grub par shog /
NK002(kha)018:67: sems can thams cad bde ba dang bde ba'i rgyu dang ldan par gyur cig /
NK002(kha)018:70: stong pa'i ngang las pam las pad+ma dang a las
NK002(kha)018:71: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du rang gi sems
NK002(kha)018:72: nyid h'u sngon po de las 'od zer 'phros /
NK002(kha)018:75: tshur 'dus yongs su gyur pa las rang nyid bcom
NK002(kha)018:76: ldan 'das sman gyi bla bee d+aur+ya 'od kyi rgyal
NK002(kha)018:77: po sku mdog sngon po zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa
NK002(kha)018:78: g.yas mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgya mdzad pas dug gsum
NK002(kha)018:80: g.yon pas mnyam gzhag gi phyag rgya mdzad pa'i steng
NK002(kha)018:81: du sman gyi bdud rtsis gang ba'i lhung bzed bsnams
NK002(kha)018:82: pa / na bza' chos gos rnam gsum ngur smrig gsol zhing /
NK002(kha)018:83: mtshan dang dpe byad kyis spras pa /
NK002(kha)018:84: zhabs rdo rje'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa /
NK002(kha)018:85: de'i g.yas su pad zla'i steng du mam las rgyal
NK002(kha)018:86: sras nyi ma ltar snang byed sku mdog dmar ser
NK002(kha)018:88: g.yon pas pad+ma'i sdong bu thugs kar bzung ba'i steng na nyi ma bsnams pa /
NK002(kha)018:89: g.yon du zla ba'i steng du a las rgyal sras
NK002(kha)018:90: zla ba ltar snang byed sku mdog dkar po zhal
NK002(kha)018:92: g.yon pas pad+ma'i sdong bu thugs kar bzung ba'i steng na zla ba bsnams pa /
NK002(kha)018:93: gnyis ka'ang g.yas mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgya dang /
NK002(kha)018:94: dar gyi stood g.yogs dang rin po che'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
NK002(kha)018:95: zhabs gnyis mnyam pa'i stabs kyis bzhengs pa /
NK002(kha)018:96: gtso bo la 'dud pa'i tshul gyis bzhugs pa /
NK002(kha)018:99: thugs ka'i sa bon las 'od zer 'phros pas /
NK002(kha)018:100: phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sangs rgyas
NK002(kha)018:101: sman bla gtso 'khor gsum gyi rnam par mdun gyi
NK002(kha)018:102: nam mkhar badz+ra sa m+aa dzah dzahmh'u bam hoh gnyis
NK002(kha)018:104: slar yang thugs ka'i sa bon las 'od zer 'phros
NK002(kha)018:105: pas dbang gi lha rigs lnga 'khor dang bcas pa
NK002(kha)018:106: badz+ra sa m+aa dzah de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
NK002(kha)018:107: kyis bdag la mngon par dbang bskur ba stsal du
NK002(kha)018:108: gsol / badz+r+ai b+ha wa a b+hi shiny+tsa h'u /
NK002(kha)018:109: zhes gsung zhing bum pa'i chus spyi bo nas dbang bskur /
NK002(kha)018:112: chu lhag ma yar lud pa las gtso bo la mi bskyod pa dang /
NK002(kha)018:113: 'khor gnyis la gtso bo nyid kyis dbur brgyan /
NK002(kha)018:114: thugs ka'i sa bon gyi mthar sngags kyis bskor ba las 'od zer 'phros pas 'phags pa mchod /
NK002(kha)018:116: sangs rgyas dang byang sems kyi thugs rje byin rlabs
NK002(kha)018:117: nus mthu thams cad 'od zer gyi rnam par spyan
NK002(kha)018:120: b+hee shadz+ye b+hee shadz+ye ma h+aa b+hee sha dz+ye r+aa dza sa mud+ga te s+w+aa h+aa /
NK002(kha)018:122: na mo b+ha ga wa te b+heeshadz+ye gu ru bee d+aur+ya pra b+ha r+aa dza ya /
NK002(kha)018:124: ar+ha te samya k+sam bud+d+ha ya /
NK002(kha)018:126: b+hee shadz+ye r+aa dz+ya mud+ga te s+w+aa h+aa /
NK002(kha)018:128: spro na sngags ring kyang bazla'o //
NK002(kha)018:129: sngags gnyis ci nus bzlas pa'i mthar /
NK002(kha)018:130: rang gi snying ga nas ye shes pa mdun gyi nam mkhar byon pa la /
NK002(kha)018:131: b+hee shadz+ye gu ru bee d+aur+ya pra b+ha r+aa dza
NK002(kha)018:132: ya sa pa ri w+aa ra badz+ra ar+g+ham sogs mchod
NK002(kha)018:134: thugs rje kun la sogs kyis bstod /
NK002(kha)018:135: bcom ldan 'das bdag dang sems can thams cad la
NK002(kha)018:136: mchog dang thun mong gi dngos grub ma lus pa
NK002(kha)018:137: stsal du gsol / badz+ra muhye shes pa gshegs /
NK002(kha)018:143: stong pa'i ngang las dbus dang g.yas g.yon dang /
NK002(kha)018:144: de'i phyogs bzhir rin po che'i khri seng ges bteg pa'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor re re /
NK002(kha)018:145: dbus su bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas sman gyi bla sogs nas /
NK002(kha)018:147: g.yas su bde bar gshegs pa chos grags rgya mtsho
NK002(kha)018:148: sku mdog dkar dmar zhal gcig phyag gnyis kyis chos
NK002(kha)018:150: g.yon du bde bar gshegs pa mngon mkhyen rgyal po sku mdog dkar po zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa /
NK002(kha)018:152: g.yon mnyam gzhag gi phyag rgya mdzad pa /
NK002(kha)018:153: shar du bde bar gshegs pa gser bzang sku mdog
NK002(kha)018:154: ser po zhal gcig phyag gnyis kyis chos 'chad kyi
NK002(kha)018:156: lhor bde bar gshegs pa sgra dbyangs rgyal po sku mdog ser po zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa /
NK002(kha)018:157: g.yas mchog sbyin dang g.yon mnyam gzhag gi phyag rgya mdzad pa /
NK002(kha)018:158: nub tu bde bar gshegs pa mya ngan med mchog
NK002(kha)018:159: sku mdog dmar skya mnyam gzhag gi phyag rgya mdzad
NK002(kha)018:160: pa / byang du bde bar gshegs pa mtshan legs
NK002(kha)018:161: sku mdog ser po zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa g.yas
NK002(kha)018:163: g.yon mnyam gzhag gi phyag rgya mdzad pa /
NK002(kha)018:164: thams cad kyang na bza' chos gos rnam gsum ngur
NK002(kha)018:165: smrig gsol zhing rdo rje'i skyil krung gis bzhugs pa
NK002(kha)018:166: / sku mtshan dang dpe byad kyis spras pa /
NK002(kha)018:167: gsung dbyangs yan lag drug cu dang ldan pa /
NK002(kha)018:168: thugs shes bya ji lta ba ji snyed mkhyen pa /
NK002(kha)018:169: 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis mdzes par byas pa'o //
NK002(kha)018:170: de thams cad kyi dpral bar /
NK002(kha)018:172: thugs ka'i sa bon las 'od zer 'phros pas sangs
NK002(kha)018:173: rgyas sman bla bde bar gshegs pa bdun dang bcas
NK002(kha)018:174: pa mdun gyi nam mkhar badz+ra sa m+aa dzah ma
NK002(kha)018:176: bcom ldan 'khor bcas gnas 'dir gshegs su gsol //
NK002(kha)018:177: dzahmh'u bam hoh gnyis su med par thim /
NK002(kha)018:178: slar yang thugs ka'i sa bon las 'od zer 'phros pas /
NK002(kha)018:180: chu lhag ma yar lud pa las rdo rje sems dpa' re res dbur brgyan /
NK002(kha)018:181: mchod pa byin rlabs gong bzhin byas la /
NK002(kha)018:182: sarba ta th+aa ga ta sa pa ri w+aa ra re re'i 'gor sbyar ba'i /
NK002(kha)018:185: badz+ra d+har+m+aa ra ni ta sogs dang /
NK002(kha)018:186: bskal pa grangs med 'das pa'i dus kyi tshe //
NK002(kha)018:187: 'phongs gyur 'gro ba mtha' dag bskyab pa'i phyir //
NK002(kha)018:188: smon lam khyad par can rnams btab gyur pa'i //
NK002(kha)018:189: bde bar gshegs pa bdun la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK002(kha)018:190: zhes bstod nas gtor ma chus sbyangs la /
NK002(kha)018:192: stong pa'i ngang las rin po che las grub pa'i
NK002(kha)018:193: snod yangs shing rgya che ba'i nang du gtor ma
NK002(kha)018:194: kha dog dri ro nus pa phun sum tshogs pa
NK002(kha)018:195: ye shes kyi bdud rtsi'i rgya mtsho chen por gyur
NK002(kha)018:197: sarba ta t+aa sa pa ri w+aa ra a k+aa ro mu kham sogs lan gsum gyi dbul /
NK002(kha)018:198: mchod bstod snga ma ltar dang /
NK002(kha)018:199: bdag dang sems can thams cad la mchog dang thun
NK002(kha)018:200: mong gi dngos grub ma lus pa stsal du gsol
NK002(kha)018:203: a k+aa ro sogs lan gsum gyi gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon bcu gnyis la phul /
NK002(kha)018:205: rdzu 'phrul stobs dang mngon par shes pa'i dpal //
NK002(kha)018:207: rdo rje'i chos skyong rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK002(kha)018:210: gzhi bdag la a k+aa ro sogs lan gsum gyis phul /
NK002(kha)018:211: gzhi bdag chen po 'khor bcas rnams //
NK002(kha)018:212: mchod sbyin gtor ma 'di bzhes la //
NK002(kha)018:215: sngags gnyis ci nus bzlas pa'i mthar gsol btab gong bzhin bya'o //
NK002(kha)018:216: de nas slob ma rnams khrus byas gral la 'khod pa la me tog bkye bsdu tshar nas /
NK002(kha)018:217: 'o nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i sems can thams cad
NK002(kha)018:218: kyi don du yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
NK002(kha)018:220: de'i ched du rjes su gnang ba zab mo gsan
NK002(kha)018:221: la don tshul bzhin du nyams su blang bar bagyi'o
NK002(kha)018:222: snyam pa bsam pa byang chub kyi mchog tu thugs
NK002(kha)018:223: bskyed pa gsal btab nas gsan par zhu /
NK002(kha)018:224: de la yang ston pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
NK002(kha)018:225: sangs rgyas de nyid kyi gdul bya rnams kyi bsam
NK002(kha)018:226: pa dang / khams dang bag la nyal la dgongs
NK002(kha)018:227: nas chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong gsungs
NK002(kha)018:228: pa'i nang nas pha rol tu phyin pa'i sde snod
NK002(kha)018:229: pa dang / dang / gsang sngags kyi theg pa gnyis las /
NK002(kha)018:230: 'dir gsang sngags kyi theg pa yin /
NK002(kha)018:231: de la yang bya ba'i rgyud dang /
NK002(kha)018:234: rnal 'byor chen po bla na med pa'i rgyud dang bzhi las /
NK002(kha)018:236: de la yang bya ba spyi'i rgyud dang /
NK002(kha)018:237: so so'i rgyud gnyis las 'dir phyi ma yin /
NK002(kha)018:238: de la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi rgyud dang /
NK002(kha)018:240: rdo rje'i rigs kyi rgyud dang /
NK002(kha)018:241: nor bu'i rigs kyi rgyud dang /
NK002(kha)018:242: lngas rtse na gyi rigs kyi rgyud dang /
NK002(kha)018:243: 'jig rten pa'i rigs kyi rgyud dang drug las /
NK002(kha)018:244: 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi rgyud yin /
NK002(kha)018:245: de la yang rnam pa brgyad yod pa'i nang nas 'dir rigs kyi gtso bo yin /
NK002(kha)018:246: de la yang bya ba'i rgyud bsam gyis mi khyab
NK002(kha)018:247: pa yod pa'i nang nas sman bla'i mdo brgyad brgya
NK002(kha)018:248: ba dang / sman la sngags kyis btab pa dang /
NK002(kha)018:249: de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi smon lam gyi khyad
NK002(kha)018:250: par rgyas pa' gzungs rnams kyi rjes su 'brangs nas
NK002(kha)018:251: / mkhan po bo d+hi sat+wa sogs kyis bkral ba'i
NK002(kha)018:252: sangs rgyas sman bla mched bdun gyi rjes su gnang
NK002(kha)018:253: ba sgrub pa la slob dpon gyis bgyi bar 'os
NK002(kha)018:255: khyed rang rnams kyi ngo skal du gyur pa la /
NK002(kha)018:258: rgyud yongs su dag par bya ba /
NK002(kha)018:259: thun mong ma yin pa'i gsol ba gdab pa rnams sngon du 'gro dgos pas /
NK002(kha)018:260: thog mar slob dpon la sangs rgyas sman bla dngos
NK002(kha)018:261: yin snyam pa'i mos gus dang ldan pas rjes su
NK002(kha)018:262: gnang ba zhu ba'i yon du man+dala 'bul bar zhu
NK002(kha)018:263: / de ltar man+dala phul nas me tog dang bcas
NK002(kha)018:264: thal mo sbyar nas gsol ba gdab pa 'di'i rjes
NK002(kha)018:265: / zlos mdzod / dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad dang //
NK002(kha)018:266: lhag pa'i lha yi ngo bo nyid //
NK002(kha)018:267: dpal ldan bla ma'i bka' drin gyis //
NK002(kha)018:268: bdag la rjes gnang stsal du gsol //
NK002(kha)018:270: rgyud dag pa'i slad du mdun gyi nam mkhar bla
NK002(kha)018:271: ma dang gnyis su med pa'i sangs rgyas sman bla
NK002(kha)018:272: gtso 'khor rnams la sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
NK002(kha)018:273: dpa'i tshogs kyi bskor ba sprin phung 'thibs pa ltar
NK002(kha)018:274: bzhugs pa'i mos pa byas te /
NK002(kha)018:275: de rnams kyi spyan sngar bdag gzhan gyi tshe rabs
NK002(kha)018:276: thog ma med pa nas bsags pa'i sdig pa bshags
NK002(kha)018:277: pa la sogs pa yan lag bdun pa bgyi snyam
NK002(kha)018:279: dkon mchog gsum la sogs nas /
NK002(kha)018:281: ces pas rgyud dag par byas nas /
NK002(kha)018:282: thun mong ma yin pa'i gsol ba gdab pa 'di'i rjes zlos lan gsum mdzod /
NK002(kha)018:283: bla ma rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po la sogs
NK002(kha)018:284: pa phyogs bcu sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'
NK002(kha)018:285: thams cad dang / bde bar gshegs pa sman bla mched bdun dang /
NK002(kha)018:286: slob dpon bdag la dgongs su gsol /
NK002(kha)018:287: khyed rang gi ming nas smos te /
NK002(kha)018:288: zhes bgyi ba la dus 'di nas bzung ste /
NK002(kha)018:289: byang chub snying po la mchis kyi bar du bcom
NK002(kha)018:290: ldan 'das sman gyi bla bee d+aur+ya 'od kyi rgyal
NK002(kha)018:291: po yi dam du slob dpon gyi stsal du gsol
NK002(kha)018:292: / zhes pa rnams rjes su gnang ba'i sngon 'gro yin /
NK002(kha)018:293: rjes gnang gi dngos gzhi la /
NK002(kha)018:294: byin gyis brlab pa'i don du dmigs pa 'di bzhin mdzod /
NK002(kha)018:295: khyed rang rnams tha mal par gsal ba'i spyi bor
NK002(kha)018:296: pad+ma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bcom
NK002(kha)018:297: ldan 'das sangs rgyas sman gyi bla bee d+aur+ya 'od
NK002(kha)018:298: kyi rgyal po sku mdog sogs nas /
NK002(kha)018:299: skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa /
NK002(kha)018:300: de'i spyi bor bde bar gshegs pa mngon mkhyen rgyal
NK002(kha)018:301: po sku mdog dkar po zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa
NK002(kha)018:302: / g.yas mchog sbyin dang g.yon mnyam gzhag gi phyag rgya mdzad pa /
NK002(kha)018:303: de'i spyi bor bde bar gshegs pa chos grags rgya
NK002(kha)018:304: mtsho sku mdog dkar dmar phyag gnyis chos 'chad kyi
NK002(kha)018:306: de'i spyi bor bde bar gshegs pa mya ngan med
NK002(kha)018:307: mchog sku mdog dmar skya mnyam gzhag gi phyag rgya
NK002(kha)018:308: mdzad pa / de'i spyi bor bde bar gshegs pa
NK002(kha)018:309: gser bzang dri med sku mdog ser po chos 'chad
NK002(kha)018:311: de'i spyi bor bde bar gshegs pa sgra dbyangs rgyal
NK002(kha)018:312: po sku mdog ser po phyag g.yas mchog sbyin dang
NK002(kha)018:313: g.yon mnyam gzhag gi phyag rgya mdzad pa /
NK002(kha)018:314: de'i spyi bor bde bar gshegs pa mtshan legs ser
NK002(kha)018:315: po phyag g.yas mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa dang g.yon
NK002(kha)018:316: mnyam gzhag gi phyag rgya mdzad pa /
NK002(kha)018:317: thams cad kyang na bza' chos gos rnam gsum ngur
NK002(kha)018:318: smrig gsol zhing pad+ma dang zla ba'i gdan la zhabs
NK002(kha)018:319: rdo rje'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa /
NK002(kha)018:320: sku mtshan dang dpe byad kyis spras pa /
NK002(kha)018:321: gsung dbyangs yan lag drug cu dang ldan pa /
NK002(kha)018:322: thugs shes bya ji lta ba dang ji snyed pa mkhyen pa /
NK002(kha)018:323: 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis mdzes par byas pa'i sku
NK002(kha)018:324: can re rer lam ste gyur pa'i mos pa dang
NK002(kha)018:325: bcas bde bar gshegs pa so so'i spyan sngar rim
NK002(kha)018:326: bzhin phyag mchod gsol ba 'debs pa'i rjes zlos dang
NK002(kha)018:327: dmigs pa 'di bzhin du mdzad par zhu /
NK002(kha)018:328: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
NK002(kha)018:329: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mtshan legs par
NK002(kha)018:330: yogs bsgrags dpal gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo
NK002(kha)018:332: de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan legs par yongs bsgrags dpal
NK002(kha)018:333: gyi rgyal pos sngon gyi smon lam ji ltar btab
NK002(kha)018:334: pa bzhin bdag dang sems can thams cad kyis skad
NK002(kha)018:335: cig la 'byong bar byin gyis brlab tu gsol /
NK002(kha)018:336: zhes gsol ba btab pas bde bar gshegs pa mtshan
NK002(kha)018:337: legs 'od du ltem gyis zhu nas sgra dbyangs rgyal
NK002(kha)018:338: po la thim pa'i mos pa mdzod /
NK002(kha)018:339: de bzhin du mtshan so so'i 'go na /
NK002(kha)018:340: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes dang /
NK002(kha)018:341: rin po che dang zla ba dang pad+mas rab tu
NK002(kha)018:342: brgyan pa mkhas pa gzi brjid sgra dbyangs kyi rgyal
NK002(kha)018:343: po gser bzang dri med rin chen snang ba brtul
NK002(kha)018:344: zhugs grub pa mya ngan med mchod dpal chos grags
NK002(kha)018:345: rgya mtsho'i dbyangs chos kyi rgya mtsho mchog gi blos
NK002(kha)018:346: rnam par rol pa mngon par mkhyen pa'i rgyal po
NK002(kha)018:347: sman gyi bla bee d+aur+ya 'od kyi rgyal po zhes
NK002(kha)018:348: pa rnams kyi mtshan re re nas sbyar ba'i phyag
NK002(kha)018:350: gong ma gong ma 'og ma 'og ma la bstim pa'i tshul rigs 'gre sbyar la /
NK002(kha)018:351: mthar zhes gsol ba btab pas bde bar gshegs pa
NK002(kha)018:352: sman gyi bla 'od du ltem gyis zhu nas khyed
NK002(kha)018:353: rang rnams kyi spyi bo tshangs pa'i bu ga nas
NK002(kha)018:354: mar thim pas 'od zer de nyid kyis khyed rang
NK002(kha)018:355: rnams kyi nad gdon sdig sgrib thams cad dag /
NK002(kha)018:356: lhag ma gshang gci dang rkang mthil nas nag nur
NK002(kha)018:357: nur bud nas song bas lus shel gong dag pa
NK002(kha)018:358: ltar gyur / de'i ngang las khyer rang rnams skad
NK002(kha)018:359: cig gis pad zla'i gdan la sangs rgyas sman gyi
NK002(kha)018:360: ltar gyur / bla sogs nas / bzhugs pa'i thugs
NK002(kha)018:361: kar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du h'u sngon
NK002(kha)018:363: slob dpon gyi thugs ka nas 'od zer bsam gyis
NK002(kha)018:364: mi khyab par 'phros pas gzhan yang sangs rgyas dang
NK002(kha)018:365: byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pa spyan drangs
NK002(kha)018:366: te khyed rang rnams kyi spyi bor thim par mos
NK002(kha)018:367: / slar yang slob dpon mdun bskyed dang bcas pa'i
NK002(kha)018:368: thug ka nas kyang sangs rgyas sman bla'i lha tshogs
NK002(kha)018:369: che ba ri rab tsam chung ba rdul phran tsam
NK002(kha)018:370: dpag tu med pa spyan drangs te khyed rang rnams
NK002(kha)018:371: kyi spyi bo'i gtsug dang ba spu'i bu ga nas
NK002(kha)018:372: mar sib kyis thim nas thugs ka'i h'u la gnyis
NK002(kha)018:373: su med par thim pas rgyud byin gyis brlabs pa'i
NK002(kha)018:374: / mos pa mdzod / dzahmh'u bam hohyanga yang brjod cing ting shag dkrol /
NK002(kha)018:375: de nyid brtan pa'i phyir du spyi bor me tog bzhag ste /
NK002(kha)018:379: zhes pa ni byin gyis brlabs pa'i rjes su gnang ba yin /
NK002(kha)018:380: sngags kyi rjes gnang gi don du slob dpon gyi
NK002(kha)018:381: thugs kar h'u yig sngags phreng dang bcas pa gsal
NK002(kha)018:382: btab / khyed rang rnams sangs rgyas sman blar gsal
NK002(kha)018:383: ba'i thugs kar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du
NK002(kha)018:384: h'u yig gcig gsal bar dmigs nas /
NK002(kha)018:385: slob dpon la sangs rgyas sman bla dngos yin snyam
NK002(kha)018:386: pa'i gus 'dud mdzad pa'i rkyen gyis slob dpon gyi
NK002(kha)018:387: thugs ka'i h'u yig las sngags phreng byung /
NK002(kha)018:389: khyed rang gi zhal du zhugs /
NK002(kha)018:390: thugs ka'i h'u yig gi 'thar g.yas skor du 'khod
NK002(kha)018:391: par mos nas sngags 'di gnyis kyi rjes zlos lan
NK002(kha)018:393: de ltar bzlas pas dang pos rgyud byin gyis brlabs /
NK002(kha)018:394: gnyis pas dbyer med du byas /
NK002(kha)018:395: gsum pas brtan par byas par mos te slob dpon
NK002(kha)018:396: la me tog gtor nas 'di'i rjes zlos lan gsum
NK002(kha)018:397: mdzod / bcom ldan bdag gis bzung lags kyi //
NK002(kha)018:398: bcom ldan bdag la byin gyis rlobs //
NK002(kha)018:400: de ltar gsol ba btab nas slob dpon gyis kyang
NK002(kha)018:401: me tog phreng ba sngags su byas te khyed rang
NK002(kha)018:402: gi spyi bor bzhag cing byin gyis brlabs pa'i mos
NK002(kha)018:403: pa mdzod / bcom ldan 'di la stsal lags kyis //
NK002(kha)018:405: rdo rje slob ma'i rgyud la sangs rgyas sman bla
NK002(kha)018:406: gtso 'khor rnams kyi gsang sngags kyi byin rlabs ma
NK002(kha)018:408: ces brjod cing me tog gtor /
NK002(kha)018:409: da nas bzung ste zhag re la sangs rgyas sman
NK002(kha)018:410: bla'i snying po du tsam 'dren khas len du bcug
NK002(kha)018:411: la / dam bca' ba'i slad du /
NK002(kha)018:412: dus da nas bzung ste sangs rgyas sman bla'i go 'phang ma thob kyi bar du /
NK002(kha)018:413: bde bar gshegs pa sman bla mched bdun yi dam
NK002(kha)018:414: du 'dzin cing de'i sngags dam bca' bzhin du nyi
NK002(kha)018:415: ma re la brgya rtsa la sogs pa 'dren snyam
NK002(kha)018:416: pas 'di'i rjes zlos lan gsum mdzod /
NK002(kha)018:418: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas dus da nas bzung
NK002(kha)018:419: ste ji srid byang chub snying po la mchis kyi
NK002(kha)018:420: bar du sangs rgyas sman bla gtso 'khor rnams yi
NK002(kha)018:421: dam gyi lhar 'dzin cing de'i gsang sngags kyang nyi
NK002(kha)018:422: ma re la brgya rtsa la sogs pa bzla ba
NK002(kha)018:425: phyis kyi dpe kha cig la mtshams 'dir thugs kyi rjes gnang spyi 'gre sbyar 'dug kyang /
NK002(kha)018:426: thar rtse pan chen rin po che'i phyag dpe dngos la mi 'byung bar ma zad /
NK002(kha)018:427: yig rnying rnams su'ang mi snang bas rang bzos bcug par nges so //
NK002(kha)018:428: me tog spyi bor bzhag cing /
NK002(kha)018:429: rdo rje slob ma rnams kyi rgyud la sangs rgyas
NK002(kha)018:430: sman bla gtso 'khor rnams kyi sku gsung thugs yon
NK002(kha)018:431: tan phrin las dang bcas pa'i byin rlabs ma lus
NK002(kha)018:433: de ltar khas blangs pa'i dam tshig 'dzin snyam pas 'di'i rjes zlos lan gsum mdzod /
NK002(kha)018:434: gtso bos ji ltar sogs brjod /
NK002(kha)018:436: deng nas brtsams te sogs brjod /
NK002(kha)018:439: mchod pa byin rlabs sogs nas /
NK002(kha)018:440: bde bar gshegs pa bdun la phyag 'tshal lo bar gong ltar /
NK002(kha)018:441: yi ge brgya pa lan gsum /
NK002(kha)018:442: ma 'byor ba dang nyams pa sogs brjod /
NK002(kha)018:443: badz+ra muhs ye shes pa gshegs /
NK002(kha)018:444: dam tshig pa rang la thim /
NK002(kha)018:447: dge ba 'di yis myur du bdag /
NK002(kha)018:448: sangs rgyas sman bla 'grub gyur nas //
NK002(kha)018:450: ston mchog dam pa sogs dang /
NK002(kha)018:451: nyin mo bde legs sogs brjod /
NK002(kha)018:452: las kyi rjes mi mngon par bya'o //
NK002(kha)018:453: zhes pa 'di ni bskul ba po'i bzhed pa ltar
NK002(kha)018:454: b+hik+sh+aa ga ga na sh+r+ai b+ha dras e wam thar
NK002(kha)018:455: pa rtser myur bar sbyar ba sarba d+aa mad+ga lam
NK002(kha)018:456: // slar yang gong 'og gi char tshig gi gsal byed 'ga' re dang /
NK002(kha)018:457: khyad par byin rlabs skabs kyi ngag 'don bklag chog
